title: One Direction's top singles - as chosen by you
text:
One Direction's top singles - as chosen by you One Direction's top singles - as chosen by you 
  
One Direction’s Harry, Liam, Louis and Niall have announced they will take a break from the band next year. 
The much-loved boy band are not expected to tour their upcoming fifth album Made in The A.M, and their gig in Sheffield at the end of the month is reported to be their last live tour performance – for a while at least. 
But we aren’t ready to let go just yet, so we’ve taken a look back at One Direction’s greatest singles and want you to rank your favourite. Share article
